title: I was 1v1d as khazix by riven, and she was isolated.
body:
I was 12-8

she was 7-8

I was fully built with 200 armor, isolated Q dealth 1k physical damage and i had 3k health

I was wrecked. A 800 health shield every 5 seconds, a stun every 5 seconds and knock up every 5 seconds DOES NOT WORK RIOT. Especially when you combine that with a steroid + aoe execute ult.

I couldnt do shit.

oh forgot the 15%, but i already added the other percent amps.
Assuming triforce, pd and ie, youmuus for your crit, that gives you 140 bonus ad. If you got two bts or equal items, that's 300 bonus ad. about 450 ad total. lets say you crit for 250%, that's about 1250 and trinity gives another 216. The skill will give about 700. add in the 38% bonus for about 2.9k damage. The person you hit would need slightly less than 100 effective armour to reduce that to less than 16k, not counting damage percent reductions from non armour sources. Since you say "any" target, you technically wouldn't hit like that on anyone with over 300 armor, which is easily achievable with three items (maybe one-two depending on the champ). With 300 armor, they will have over 100 effective armor unless you have a teammate with armor reduction, which means your damage will not reach or exceed 1600.
